Service Details: - Offers a Mobile Assessment Unit that provides an innovative approach allowing people over the age of 65 without a family doctor to self-identify that they would like one- Appointments at various centres in the Central Okanagan can then be arranged by either calling or emailing- For additional information: please visit the website
